name: Hora Canyon (full)
description:
Introduction

A beautiful canyon leads to wadi "Ibn Hammad" at the end, full of trees and amazing views.

Approach

Park your car in Wadi Bin Hammad, then take a shuttle to the start point, because you'll finish at wadi bin hammad. The approach after the 4wd car to the canyon ground is tricky, follow the small cairns or goat spathes.

Descent

Exit

Just walk back to bin Hammad parking (30 min)

Red tape

Beta sites

Trip reports and media

Background
